trans-unit.source: Here you can enter a unique filename (without extension). The XML feed file will be auto-generated in the share directory of your Contao installation, e.g. as share/podcast.xml.
trans-unit.target: Here you can enter a unique filename (without extension). The XML feed file will be auto-generated in the share directory of your Contao installation, e.g. as share/podcast.xml.

trans-unit.source: Please enter the feed language according to the ISO-639 standard (e.g. en or en-us).
trans-unit.target: Please enter the feed language according to the ISO-639 standard (e.g. en or en-us).

trans-unit.source: Will be displayed in the description column in iTunes. For best results, choose a subtitle that is only a few words long.
trans-unit.target: Will be displayed in the description column in iTunes. For best results, choose a subtitle that is only a few words long.

trans-unit.source: This shown on the iTunes Store page for your podcast. The information also appears in a separate window if the information (“i”) icon in the Description column is clicked. This field can be up to 4000 characters.
trans-unit.target: This shown on the iTunes Store page for your podcast. The information also appears in a separate window if the information (“i”) icon in the Description column is clicked. This field can be up to 4000 characters.

trans-unit.source: Users can browse podcast subject categories on iTunes. check https://www.apple.com/itunes/podcasts/specs.html#categories
trans-unit.target: Users can browse podcast subject categories on iTunes. check https://www.apple.com/itunes/podcasts/specs.html#categories

trans-unit.source: This tag contains contact information for the owner of the podcast intended to be used for administrative communication about the podcast. This information is not displayed on the iTunes Store.
trans-unit.target: This tag contains contact information for the owner of the podcast intended to be used for administrative communication about the podcast. This information is not displayed on the iTunes Store.

trans-unit.source: Points to the artwork for your podcast. Cover art must be in the JPEG or PNG file formats and in the RGB color space with a minimum size of 1400 x 1400 pixels and a maximum size of 3000 x 3000 pixels.
trans-unit.target: Points to the artwork for your podcast. Cover art must be in the JPEG or PNG file formats and in the RGB color space with a minimum size of 1400 x 1400 pixels and a maximum size of 3000 x 3000 pixels.

trans-unit.source: The content of this tag is shown in the Artist column in iTunes.
trans-unit.target: The content of this tag is shown in the Artist column in iTunes.

trans-unit.source: Here you can choose the news archives to be included in the feed.
trans-unit.target: Here you can choose the news archives to be included in the feed.

trans-unit.source: Here you can limit the number of feed items. Set to 0 to export all.
trans-unit.target: Here you can limit the number of feed items. Set to 0 to export all.

trans-unit.source: Please enter the base URL with protocol (e.g. http://).
trans-unit.target: Please enter the base URL with protocol (e.g. http://).

trans-unit.source: Enter a short description of the iTunes feed.
trans-unit.target: Enter a short description of the iTunes feed.

trans-unit.source: Show the details of feed ID %s
trans-unit.target: Show the details of feed ID %s
